name: SBCamera v1.6
desc: Various camera tweaks. Including wider fov, first person aiming and a centered lock-on camera with a fixed vertical angle. All features are optional and can be customized during installation.

multi.name: Field Of View
multi.desc: Includes wider field of view (90 degrees horizontal) and changes to the camera distance.

multi.name: First Person Aiming
multi.desc: Throwing weapons, and aiming with runes and bows is in first person.

multi.name: Lock-On Camera
multi.desc: Includes a centered lock-on camera with a fixed vertical angle and changes to the camera angle.
